techmeme.title: Sources: 2025's Apple Watch Ultra is slated to get satellite connectivity for off-the-grid text messages, and it may also get a blood pressure sensing feature (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
Stainless, a startup offering an AI-powered API-to-SDK generator to customers like OpenAI, Anthropic, and Meta, raised a $25M Series A led by a16z (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
The US sanctions Chinese cybersecurity government contractor Sichuan Silence and one of its staff over Ragnarok ransomware ties and creating and using zero-days (Sergiu Gatlan/BleepingComputer)
Instagram officially rolls out "trial reels", which give creators a way to test out videos by publishing them only to people who don't follow them (Aisha Malik/TechCrunch)
TSMC reports $8.5B in consolidated November revenue, up 34% YoY but down 12% from October's record, when it projected Q4 revenue up 11%-14% QoQ to $26.1B-$26.9B (Kunal Khullar/Tom's Hardware)
